function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of the virus due to economic instability and behavioral changes leading to cultural and lifestyle changes","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and potential strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, promoting vaccination, and raising awareness of hygiene practices","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, health monitoring systems, and telemedicine platforms","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government health agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Hardships faced by SMEs in sectors with high public interaction","Impact":"Decreased financial stability of SMEs and potential closure of businesses","Mitigation":"Providing financial support, offering tax incentives, and facilitating access to technology and digital platforms","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, e-commerce platforms, and remote work tools","People":"Small business owners, employees, and local communities","Owner":"Government economic agencies, business associations"},{"Description":"Need for resilience and adaptability in entrepreneurship amidst the crisis","Impact":"Increased pressure on entrepreneurs to innovate and adapt to market dynamics","Mitigation":"Providing training and mentorship, fostering a culture of innovation, and facilitating access to resources and networks","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, collaborative tools, and digital networking platforms","People":"Entrepreneurs, small business owners, and workforce","Owner":"Entrepreneurship support organizations, industry associations"}]}
